data: CARD Inpatient Pre Cardiac Procedure
Diet/Nutrition
NPO for Procedure
6 hours prior to PCI and Angiogram, may have clear fluids until 2 hours prior to procedure
6 hours prior to Permanent Pacemaker and ICD Implantation
6 hours prior to Electrophysiology Studies and Ablation
6 hours prior to Transcatheter Heart Valve Implantation

If patient requires General Anesthesia, patient to be NPO 6 hours prior to structurl heart procedures. If patient does not require General Anesthesia, patient to be NPO 3 hours prior to structural heart procedures, may take medication with sips
NPO for Procedure
Stop enteral tube feeding 8 hours prior to procedure in a non-intubated non-ventilated patient
Communication Order
For intubated ventilated patients, stop and aspirate the NG-tube /OG-tube immediately prior to transfer for procedure
Continuous Infusions
Refer to Contrast - Induced Nephropathy (CIN) protocol if eGFR LESS than 45 mL/min and NOT on dialysis
sodium chloride 0.9% (NS) continuous infusion
order rate: 1 mL/kg/h, IV, drug form: bag
sodium chloride 0.9% (NS) continuous infusion
order rate: 3 mL/kg/h, IV, drug form: bag

None
Communication Order
Confirm with triage coordinator or operating physician for when to discontinue heparin, low molecular weight heparin, warfarin, antiplatelet agents, direct oral anticoagulants, aspirin
